Jeffrey P. Kramer D/B/A String Instrument Services & CloverLick Banjos 249 S. Kane Street Burlington, WI 53105-1852 262-763-9733 Office or Fax 262-763-3885 Home Clover Lick banjos are handmade in my shop. Every banjo is built individually in my shop. These banjos are designed for playing old-time music with the PineyWoods model or bluegrass with the BlackMountain model. Tonal quality being sought is a clear, crisp, snappiness with minimal overtones, plunky while not too tubby, not overly long sustain, and with good response across all playing attacks from quiet to raw dance rhythm.
